articles.author: Donna Lu
articles.title: Coronavirus: Why I chose to stay in Wuhan rather than return to the UK
articles.description: As governments evacuate foreign nationals from China, New Scientist speaks to a British man about life in Wuhan and why some people are choosing to stay
articles.content:
By Donna Lu
Facemasks are selling out in Wuhan
ANTHONY WALLACE/AFP via Getty Images
As the number of coronavirus cases in China soars, international governments have chartered flights out of Wuhan for foreign nationals. The UK has urged all its citizens in… [+4105 chars]
